sources.title: The Time of Their Lives (1946)
sources.description: Two ghosts, who were mistakenly branded as traitors during the Revolutionary War, return to 20th century New England to retrieve a letter from George Washington which would prove their innocence. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-time-of-their-lives-1946/

metadata.Plot: Two ghosts who were mistakenly branded as traitors during the Revolutionary War return to 20th century New England to retrieve a letter from George Washington which would prove their innocence.
metadata.Writer: Val Burton, Walter DeLeon, Bradford Ropes
metadata.Actors: Bud Abbott, Lou Costello, Marjorie Reynolds
